bio:
Idolaf Battle-Born lives in the city of Whiterun. Like the rest of his family, he strongly supports the Imperial Legion in Skyrim's ongoing civil war between the Empire and the traitorous Stormcloak rebels. He is married to Alfhild, with whom he has a young son named Lars.
On behalf of local Imperial Legion soldiers, he recently put in order for swords to Adrianne Avenicci, the ethnically Imperial woman who runs a smithy near Whiterun's front gate.
name: Idolaf Battle-Born
